statements: SELECT * FROM subscriber_data
SELECT name, email_address FROM subscriber_data
SELECT preferences FROM subscriber_data
SELECT name, email_address, preferences FROM subscriber_data WHERE name = 'John'
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT email_address, name FROM subscriber_data WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data WHERE preferences->>'language' = 'English';
SELECT name, email_address FROM subscriber_data ORDER BY email_address ASC;
SELECT name, preferences FROM subscriber_data WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT email, name, preferences FROM subscribers;
SELECT name, email FROM subscribers;
SELECT preferences, email, name FROM subscribers;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT name, email FROM subscribers WHERE preferences = 'weekly newsletter';
SELECT * FROM subscribers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT name, email, preferences FROM subscribers WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT DISTINCT preferences FROM subscribers;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT id, email FROM subscribers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM subscribers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT s.first_name, c.campaign_name FROM subscribers s JOIN campaign_subscriptions cs ON s.id = cs.subscriber_id JOIN email_campaigns c ON cs.campaign_id = c.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, email, first_name, last_name FROM subscribers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, c.campaign_name FROM subscribers s JOIN campaign_subscriptions cs ON s.id = cs.subscriber_id JOIN email_campaigns c ON cs.campaign_id = c.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE preferences->'notification' = 'email' AND preferences->'frequency' = 'daily';
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM subscribers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT subscriber_id FROM campaign_subscriptions WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT preference_name FROM preferences ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT email, preferences FROM subscribers WHERE id = 123;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT s.name, c.campaign_name, c.start_date FROM subscribers s JOIN campaign_subscriptions cs ON s.id = cs.subscriber_id JOIN campaigns c ON cs.campaign_id = c.campaign_id;
SELECT p.preference_name, s.name FROM preferences p JOIN subscribers s ON s.preferences = p.preference_id;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT email_address, first_name, last_name FROM subscribers WHERE email_address = 'example@email.com';
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, preferences FROM subscribers WHERE preferences->>'language' = 'English';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, preferences FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT subscribers.email_address, campaigns.campaign_name FROM subscribers JOIN subscribers_campaigns ON subscribers.subscriber_id = subscribers_campaigns.subscriber_id JOIN campaigns ON subscribers_campaigns.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT template_name, content, created_at FROM email_templates ORDER BY created_at DESC;
